title: Subway and Streetcar Operators
descr: Operate subway or elevated suburban trains with no separate locomotive, or electric-powered streetcar, to transport passengers. May handle fares.
alt_titles: Combined Rail Operator, Electric Motorman, Elevated Motorman, Light Rail Operator, Light Rail Train Operator, Light Rail Transit Operator, Light Rail Vehicle Operator (LRV Operator), Monorail Operator, Motor Operator, Rail Operator, Rail Transit Operator, Rapid Transit Operator (RTO), Service Vehicle Operator, Shuttle Route Vehicle Operator, Streetcar Motorman, Streetcar Operator, Subway Conductor, Subway Train Driver, Subway Train Operator, Track Car Operator, Trackmobile Operator, Train Operator, Tram Operator, Trammer, Transfer Car Operator, Transit Operator, Trolley Car Operator, Trolley Operator, Vehicle Operator
experience: Some previous work-related skill, knowledge, or experience is usually needed. For example, a teller would benefit from experience working directly with the public.
education: These occupations usually require a high school diploma.
job_training: Employees in these occupations need anywhere from a few months to one year of working with experienced employees. A recognized apprenticeship program may be associated with these occupations.
example: These occupations often involve using your knowledge and skills to help others. Examples include orderlies, counter and rental clerks, customer service representatives, security guards, upholsterers, tellers, and dental laboratory technicians.

work_tasks.title: Subway and Streetcar Operators
work_tasks.task: Report delays, mechanical problems, and emergencies to supervisors or dispatchers, using radios.
work_tasks.descr: Report delays, mechanical problems, and emergencies to supervisors or dispatchers, using radios.

work_tasks.title: Subway and Streetcar Operators
work_tasks.task: Monitor lights indicating obstructions or other trains ahead and watch for car and truck traffic at crossings to stay alert to potential hazards.
work_tasks.descr: Monitor lights indicating obstructions or other trains ahead and watch for car and truck traffic at crossings to stay alert to potential hazards.

work_tasks.title: Subway and Streetcar Operators
work_tasks.task: Operate controls to open and close transit vehicle doors.
work_tasks.descr: Operate controls to open and close transit vehicle doors.

work_tasks.title: Subway and Streetcar Operators
work_tasks.task: Drive and control rail-guided public transportation, such as subways, elevated trains, and electric-powered streetcars, trams, or trolleys, to transport passengers.
work_tasks.descr: Drive and control rail-guided public transportation, such as subways, elevated trains, and electric-powered streetcars, trams, or trolleys, to transport passengers.

work_tasks.title: Subway and Streetcar Operators
work_tasks.task: Collect fares from passengers, and issue change and transfers.
work_tasks.descr: Collect fares from passengers, and issue change and transfers.

work_tasks.title: Subway and Streetcar Operators
work_tasks.task: Record transactions and coin receptor readings to verify the amount of money collected.
work_tasks.descr: Record transactions and coin receptor readings to verify the amount of money collected.

work_tasks.title: Subway and Streetcar Operators
work_tasks.task: Complete reports, including shift summaries and incident or accident reports.
work_tasks.descr: Complete reports, including shift summaries and incident or accident reports.

work_tasks.title: Subway and Streetcar Operators
work_tasks.task: Greet passengers, provide information, and answer questions concerning fares, schedules, transfers, and routings.
work_tasks.descr: Greet passengers, provide information, and answer questions concerning fares, schedules, transfers, and routings.

work_tasks.title: Subway and Streetcar Operators
work_tasks.task: Attend meetings on driver and passenger safety to learn ways in which job performance might be affected.
work_tasks.descr: Attend meetings on driver and passenger safety to learn ways in which job performance might be affected.

work_tasks.title: Subway and Streetcar Operators
work_tasks.task: Regulate vehicle speed and the time spent at each stop to maintain schedules.
work_tasks.descr: Regulate vehicle speed and the time spent at each stop to maintain schedules.

work_tasks.title: Subway and Streetcar Operators
work_tasks.task: Make announcements to passengers, such as notifications of upcoming stops or schedule delays.
work_tasks.descr: Make announcements to passengers, such as notifications of upcoming stops or schedule delays.
